overview: Deranged mind Joe Choi gives us a blood red comedy for the stoner in all of us! Set up in the vein of Low Budget Pictures or a Troma flick this SOV trashterpiece delivers the laughs and the bloodshed!  No more shitty shark movies, it's time to make a good one!
tagline: No more shitty shark movies, it's time to make a good one!
title: Cannabis Holocaust
